description: This maple and balsamic-glazed roast leg of lamb will become the centre of attention this Christmas. Colourful and cooked to perfection, is it any wonder?
keywords: Balsamic-Glazed Lamb With Green Olive Tapenade
name: Balsamic-Glazed Lamb With Green Olive Tapenade Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.5 cup Woolworths extra virgin olive oil

recipeInstructions.text: Top lamb with a little of the olive tapenade and scatter over reserved parsley leaves. Serve with remaining olive tapenade.
